        public java.lang.String newnetgame(Board gameboard)
        The client function for the network game
        Parameters:
        bau - indicates if the JFrame has already been created * @param gameboard the game board
        Returns:
        gameboard text string which can be seen in the windows if no connection has been established null if the connection has been established

        gameboard - the game board
        Returns:
        1 if successful, 0 if not successful

      • addLine

        public int addLine(int anzahl,
                   Board gameboard,
                   java.net.Socket ubgclient)
        Adds Lines to the own game if gameboard network signal or gameboard random event causes this
        Parameters:
        anzahl - the amount of lines to create
        gameboard - the game board
        Returns:
        1 if the game has ended caused by the lines added, 0 if the game is still continuing
